A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Not only the worst of all the SW movies\, but a complete insult to the fans.  This movie was shockingly bad.  I tried to watch it a second time to see if my expectations were too high\, but no\, it was worse than i originally thought.  This is the movie thst did the impossible - i no longer care about the past movies\, or the future ones.  \n\nWell done Ruin Johnson and Kathleen Kennedy.
